name: A820 kernel
body:
export PATH=~/Your_Toolchain_PATH/
for example /alps/prebuilts/gcc/linux-x86/arm/arm-linux-androideabi-4.6/bin
build-commands
kernel
======
1. $cd kernel directory
2. $TARGET_PRODUCT=lenovo89_cu_jb MTK_ROOT_CUSTOM=../mediatek/custom/ make

======
Contact Lenovo support for information on obtaining Open Source code.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
